con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-redeemVoucher-VoMS-Errors
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests correct error codes derived from specification in for DRC: svn://svn.sg.de.pri.o2.com/DealerPortal/DirectRecharge/trunk/SRs/Interfaces/MCE/ST_OVD_Portal_DP_DRC_U-036_MCE_IFS.pdf
Element | Mandatory | Description service Code of the result. Possible values: 0 - Operation successful 1 - Duplicated: A request with the same data was already successfully processed 1000 - MSISDN invalid 1001 - VOUCHER CODE invalid 1002 - No service provider found for given MSISDN 1003 - Service provider does not have permission for using of this 1004 - Voucher used up 1005 - Voucher expired 1006 - All other validation errors 1007 - IN account for given MSISDN expired or invalid 2000 - Already in progress: a request with the same data is currently processing by another thread 2010 - External application unavailable 2020 - Error delivered from Piranha application 2040 - Error delivered from OCS application 2050 - Error delivered from VoMS application
for VoMS: svn://svn.sg.de.pri.o2.com/DealerPortal/DirectRecharge/trunk/SRs/Interfaces/VoMS/Telefonica VoMS Adaption Layer V1.3.pdf 4.1.1.1.2.1 Validation Results
Symbolic Name Validation Result Description TEF_RES_OK 0 Validation was successful TEF_RES_UNKNOWN_VOUCHER 1 Unknown voucher TEF_RES_CROSS_USAGE_DENIED 2 Service provider matching failed Cross usage not allowed TEF_RES_INVALID_APPLICATION 3 Invalid application TEF_RES_VOUCHER_USED 4 Voucher already in state USED TEF_RES_VOUCHER_EXPIRED 5 Voucher expired TEF_RES_OTHER 6 All other validation errors TEF_RES_FRAUD_DETECTED 7 Fraud detected TEF_RES_VOUCHER_NOT_VALID_YET 11 Voucher not valid yet TEF_RES_VOUCHER_BLOCKED 12 Voucher blocked TEF_RES_VOUCHER_NOT_ACTIVE 13 Voucher in production (State „GENERATED“) TEF_OEEX_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE (managed as OperationError) Service is not available (over load etc.) TEF_OEEX_FORMAT_ERROR (managed as OperationError) Format error in input paramters TEF_OEEX_OVERLOAD_PROTECTION (managed as OperationError) System detected overload

con:assertion.name: Check for contains of [resultMessage] is VoMS
Check for contains of [resultMessage] is VoMS
